subject: Your {{project_title}} Account Has Been Suspended
body:
Dear {{first_name}} {{last_name}},

We regret to inform you that your account has been suspended.

This suspension is effective immediately, and you will no longer have access to the platform.

If you have questions, our support team is here to help. Feel free to reach out at {{support_email}}.

Thank you for understanding.

With regards,
The {{project_title}} Team
